change.changenote: Section 1 definition of "charge" BEFORE amended by BC Reg 98/2018, effective May 17, 2018.

bcl:definition.bcl:text: charge means a development cost charge imposed under section 933 (6) of the Local Government Act for a subdivision approval or grant of a building permit;

change.changenote: Section 7 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 255/2011, effective July 1, 2012.

section.sectiontext: A developer electing to pay a charge by instalments must deposit with the treasurer at the same time as he pays the first instalment

paragraph.paragraphtext: an irrevocable letter of credit or undertaking from a bank, credit union or a trust company registered under the Financial Institutions Act, or
a bond of a surety licensed under the Insurance Act, or

section.subsandwich: which ensures to the satisfaction of the treasurer that upon default the balance of the unpaid charge will be recoverable from the person, the bank, the surety or from the proceeds of the realization of the security, as the case may be.
